item.description:
Our July Meetup is at the home of Lori Power in the Back Cove area off of Ocean Avenue. Lori and her family have done some excellent work over the years, including having to address "troubled" soil! Come learn more and share ideas and a potluck meal with the group.

Open to all experience levels.

House meetings typically go like this:

  • Meet at 6:30 and start a tour of our member's home while we have daylight (try to arrive by or before 6:30 if you can so you don't miss anything our host has to tell us or miss questions from other members...)
  • During the tour we hear about site "assets" and "challenges" and ask questions
  • About 7:15 or 7:30 we have a potluck supper, general conversation and then a bit of an agenda such as..
  • Roundtable - introductions and thoughts about the property we viewed
  • A summary of our best ideas for the member to use as they see fit
  • A few house keeping items, like upcoming events, etc.
  • Break up between 8:30 and 9:00



Alas - I didn't get to post the potluck info so I'm trusting that what we bring is what we're meant to eat!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: July Permaculture Meetup in Portland Maine
